title: Stepstowealth
author: Stepstowealth
content: Learning a skill can cost you money, especially the kind skill wey you know say dey very valuable. Person nor gats allow the cost to learn a certain skill stop am from learning the skill because person dey try dey economical make e manage money small. If you dey try dey economical not to spend too much money to learn something, you fit continue to dey manage like that dey go because you failed to take the risk to improve what you earn at the time when you had the opportunity. Another reason not to reason money wey you wan use learn important skill na because, the money wey you dey invest to the skill, you go get am back many times as soon as you start to use the skill dey make money.

comments.author: Forever101
comments.body: Na better advice be that ooo, as you dey invest , learn skill make you put your egg for different basket. For where you wan learn the skill, sign an agreement bcos for my area here apprentice no far from modern slavery. Oga dey use apprentice work like Jackie. Why bring this matter be say, e good make una get agreement make the work no take all your time. And if na picking you wan put there, sign agreement make your picking no turn to slave in the name of learning work.

comments.author: Egii Nna
comments.body: This is the truth behind living in Nigeria, because if you have no handwork or skill you learn, even though you invest in bitcoin and get profits, you won’t have an idea on how to utilise the profit you have gotten because you will be thinking that you want to open a business, and when trying to open a new business, you have to do adequate research about the business. If possible, you should learn the business before starting; if not, you will end up losing everything and regret it because if you have engaged in any skill before, you can still practice it with the money you have received as a profit. Because in Nigeria, the truth is that youth shouldn’t even think of jobs after graduation but rather start planning strategies for creating job opportunities for other people, which is by creating a self-employment skill that will bring income to you, to the country, and also reduce the issue of unemployment in the country. That can only be achieved by learning a skill and also practicing it.

comments.author: Roseline492
comments.body: For our obodo 9ja now, the only way people fit manage they take care of themselves na for only through skills acquired, there are plenty skills way company's they always look for  these days, like welders, fitters, scaffolding and plenty other skills but the only problem be be say to get those skills na money ooh but if you go fit sort out your way to learn am e they very good because if you find yourself outside 9ja you done blow be that because those skills na hotcake outside the country so if we get funds make we they equipped ourselves because we no no were opportunity go take come out.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: You have hit a hot nail on a hot iron. Most youths nowadays find it difficult to pay money to learn skills. Some of them find it difficult to pay for the skills they want to acquire, and they don't end up using the money for reasonable things, so what is the essence of not paying the money to learn the skills?It is good that if we want to do something that will help us in future, let's not try to look back and lose preoccupations, so what is best is to pay for learning skills and not think about the money we would pay to acquire the skills.While on this forum, in other sections, I have seen some discussions where people, including me, are talking about risk. It is not that while trying to acquire skills we are risking it because it is all about patience, but when we have to pay to get the skills it is like a bit of risk is involved, so we should not look at risk before making any move.

comments.body: The tin way you talk here makes sense well well. Make research to find out the skill way you go learn way go put food for your table as you dy finish to learn am., and you fit dey save up money for skill way you want learn small small anytime you receive your monthly salary, no wait make the money come one time. As you dy learn the skill bring your head down anything way your oga or madam tell you to do, do am make he/her teach you everything you suppose know for the skill so that you go sabi to do the skill well well when your oga or madam go free you.

comments.body: People wey you dey see say dem no wan use the money wey dem get learn new skill na because say dem dey fear make their money no go fall into the wrong hands. But learning new skill na im be d koko if person wan increase him income for naija here. You no fit depend on only one source of income unless you try oda ones too wey go compensate you. Risk dey part of our daily life hustle but d ability to carry risk na risk himself because no be everybody get dat mind. Sometimes, till sometin don happen to person na him dem dey know their true potential as a person before dem take the right step for life. They no need to dey force dos people, dem go try oda means at d right time or go explore oda means when something cause dem to do so.

Purchasing how to get the money while time goes? And what if na dream way ur hand no fit reach to acquire the skill today or tomorrow due to the hug  amount of money demanded ? Maybe like u want be a "Marine Engineer" or a "Pilot" or other skills way ur money no reach and u no get hope on how to obtained the height of the dream, u no see am say e dey burn persons dearest supposed to be productive times?See eehh... Of course yes.My advice about acquires be say no skill is a scrap and unproductive. Go for anyone you can afford til you Plus up (next level)

Another reason not to reason money wey you wan use learn important skill na because, the money wey you dey invest to the skill, you go get am back many times as soon as you start to use the skill dey make money.My brother no be lie you dy talk, you know say, when you never too dy financially stable, to remove better money use go pay for skill learn dy somehow cheating to you, because the question you go dy ask urself is that, how sure say I go gain back my money back.Ok make we look at my own story, their was a time when I been wan go pay money learn pure technical analysis, during that time, no be say I no know small or say I be complete novies for technical analysis oo, just that my decision making while trading most times no dey perfect like someone wey them teach, base on say the person na my guy, him say base on our close relationship, him go collect only 70k from me instead of 130k, though at first, I feel say the money to much, but as i do a lot of deep thinking, I come decide to pay and learn am, and to tell you the truth, I don really gain am, I make more than that money I pay to use learn am before I even finish the training.So it's very important to learn a high paying skill, just no reason the money wey dy involved, if not, you go dy discouraged, and as of today, I can confidently say trading na one of my source of income, because anyhow the market bad reach,  I must make the least 150usdt monthly, why am I saying this is that, if you wan learn any skill wey you believe in, no just reason the money wey dey involve, just run am, later you go really appreciate am say you make that move.
